chapters.prose: You find yourself on a path through an unfamiliar forest on the cusp of winter. Watery sunlight shines through the yellow canopy, and the woods are alive with the sound of a cool wind crackling through fallen leaves.
You walk north, away from the forest, into the mountains, up and up and up.
You choose the southern path. After a long time walking through the forest you come to the sea.
The wine-dark sea rumbles far beneath you. You leap.
